p2: In search of an opportunity in the area of projects and technology, I present to you my resume.
p3: Among my personal characteristics stands out the commitment, sense of belonging and continuous search for knowledge. Among the professionals, experience in account and project management, data administration, solution development and product and portfolio management stands out..
p4: I also inform you that I have availability for travel.
p5: Waiting for a contact, I make myself available.
